Class Bot

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.company.Player
      • com.company.Bot

  • public class Bot
extends Player
    this class is subclass for player and have the same informations and methods the only difference is bot class chose cards it self in put card and draw method

        public boolean undoDraw(int draw,
